name: MoonQuest
description: A procedurally-generated adventure game with roguelike and minecraftian gameplay. Each game generates a new world to explore with wild forests, giant mountains and ancient ruins. Harvest resources, find treasure, and forge the weapons that will help you on your journey.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics with at least 2GB or VRAM and OpenGL 3.0 support Storage: 300 MB available space
